item.description:
TICKET **SALE** TOMORROW: FEBRUARY 21. ONE DAY ONLY. TICKETS ARE $50 INSTEAD OF $75. (Includes three drink tickets, appetizers, music, food, and is a chartiable donation)

https://bostonglow.nationbuilder.com/ignite_the_nite_2013_tickets

IT'S FOR A GREAT CAUSE!

Join us for a fun night out with Boston's hippest crowd- young professionals up to senior donors. Drinks, food, dancing, live music, special guests and a silent auction to support Boston GLOW.

Are you familiar with Boston GLOW? We're a 100% volunteer run organization that raises money to provide scholarships for young woman in Boston's most under-resourced schools in our most at-risk communities. Last years Ignite the Nite event raised $30,000 in scholarship funds, and this year our goal is a minimum of $35,000.

This will be the third year of the gala, so we're excited for great success. The last two years have resulted in 8 of our scholarship winners going to college, some of them first exiting the shelter system, procuring safe housing and earning their GED, others finally leaving behind a neighborhood riddled with gang violence to start a brighter future for themselves and their families.

Buy tickets here:
http://www.bostonglow.org/ignite_the_nite_2013_calendar2

** I am volunteering at the event, so if someone else could step up as "Organizer," that would be appreciate as I just can't do both! **
item.name: Boston GLOW Ignite the Nite
